subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ortiz hit a three-run homer with first base open to break a fifth-inning tie, and Adrian Beltre had four hits Tuesday to lead the Boston Red Sox to an 8-5 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays.
snippet: Ortiz hit a three-run homer with first base open to break a fifth-inning tie, and Adrian Beltre had four hits Tuesday to lead the Boston Red Sox to an 8-5 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays.
